name: Hotel RH Royal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was my first trip to Benidorm and did not know what to expect but this Hotel made me feel very comfortable and at ease straight away. The food is excellent and better than the food we have on our usual cruise holiday. We stayed for 6 nights in march and during that time there was veal, rabbit, duck as well as the usual meats available for the evening buffet. Plenty of choice for breakfast and lunch as well. The rooms were clean, the bar area friendly and not expensive and the pool was lovely with plenty of sunbeds and seats. Only 5 minute walk to old town and we paid 1.20 euro on bus to take us to new town on the night for entertainment, walking back to the hotel took 20 mins. We also went on local bus to Altea, took about 45 mins and that only cost 1.20 euro each as well. Good day out if it is a little cloudy.
reviews.title: deserves to be no. 1 hotel in benidorm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our second visit to the Royal having stayed twice across the road at the sister hotel Victoria. Both very good hotels but on balance we prefer the smaller Royal .I emailed prior to our arrival to request a high room at the back and our request was acknowledged (always a good sign) and met. It is a bit quieter at the back away from the road.
reviews.title: Deserves its high rating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed full board and it was very good value for money.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food quality was very good with a wide choice. It didn't affect us but there is a limited choice for vegetarians. The management seems to have addressed the issues with the buffet food not being hot enough as it was better on this visit.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.text: The service from the staff throughout the hotel is first class and the whole place is spotless.
reviews.title: A peaceful and stylish haven in a crazy town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Hotel Royal from the 28th Dec to 4th Jan. Read the comments about a poor Xmas Day so felt a need to go into print about our experience over New Year. Stayed from the 28th to the 4th Jan.
reviews.title: Hotel really made an effort over New Year

reviews.text: The Hotel including all the staff really made an effort at the Gala Dinner on New Year’s Eve. Canapés & wine were available prior to the dinner in the main bar. We were a couple but were seated with other English guests.
reviews.title: lovely end to 2010 and wonderful start to 2011 staying here

reviews.text: The menu was very impressive seven courses all served with free drinks (they just replaced the wine when the bottle was empty). The meal took over 3 hours but it didn’t seem that long.
reviews.title: Just Royal

reviews.text: After completing the meal, all guests were invited down to the concert room where entertainment was put on to see in the New Year in Spanish & English Time, again all the drinks were free . We really had a great night.
reviews.title: Happy stay in relaxed atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Regarding the Hotel it’s self, ideally located between the old & new towns. The food was fine always something to eat (we were full board).
reviews.title: a very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have just returned from a five night stay at the Royal. A lovely hotel in an ideal location, just a few minutes walk to the Old Town. The hotel is very clean, staff were friendly and the bedrooms were very pleasant and a good size. Breakfast was very good with lots of choice. The evening meals, however, were poor. I know some of the reviews said there was lots of choice but think I'd have preferred less choice and better quality. For two of the five nights we were there we ate out.
reviews.title: Perfect apart from the food!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having said that we went to have a look at several other hotels in Benidorm and thought the Royal was by far the best choice.
reviews.title: great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really enjoyed Benidorm and would stay at the Royal if we went again, but probably on a bed and breakfast basis.
reviews.title: A Top Hotel
Contemporary hotel, food poor, staff poor, no sun around pool!
reviews.text: arrived at the royal at 10pm. as we checked in the guy on the desk told us they would provide a dinner for us in the dining room, totally unexpected as dinner finishes at 9.30pm. hotel is spotless in all areas.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: you are in the centre of benidorm, handy for the old town, and in the middle of both the beaches. the guy who was in charge of the bar is a gem,
reviews.title: good hotel in an excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in the Royal for 7 nights at the end of Febuary.The hotel is located close to Levante beach on the edge of the old town.The hotel it's self is very clean.The maid cleaned our room every day.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed H/B. There was a good selection at breakfast with both cooked foods,cereals,yogurts and fruit.
reviews.title: Contemporary, spotless clean hotel - the number one full-board option in Benidorm!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There was also a good selection at dinner.The food was well cooked and there was something for every taste.
reviews.title: MADE OUR BREAK MORE ENJOYABLE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At the bar there was two happy hours a day. 2 for 1, a bargain.The prices are pretty reasonable anyway.Although the bar staff can get a bit overwhelmed at these times but they do their best, especially Juan Antonio.
reviews.title: A very pleasing experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel in Great Location

description: The Royal is a modern, comfortable hotel, only 400m from the famous “Levante” beach and the “Old Town”. All rooms, with views and balconies, are fully equipped. Double rooms are twin bedded and single rooms with king or queen size bed. Coffee and tea making facilities and iron/ironing board on request, free of charge.Our extensive facilities, international cuisine and the attentive, professional staff, make the Royal the ideal place to spend your holiday.
